- Location: Interior wall-to-ceiling corner near entry doorway; painted drywall with orange-peel texture.
- Condition: Hairline crack along the wall-ceiling seam; slight paint separation along the joint.
- Materials: Drywall, joint compound, paint, caulk; wood door trim present.
- Moisture/Mold: No visible staining or mold; no bulging or sagging.
- Recommendation: Re-tape/fill seam with joint compound, sand smooth, repaint; re-caulk the joint to prevent further cracking. Monitor for changes.
